function.name: fullscreenColor
function.description: Sets all pixels on the display to the specified color based on RGB Format.

r.description: Specifies the RED part of the pixel between 0 and 255.

g.description: Specifies the GREEN part of the pixel between 0 and 255.

b.description: Specifies the BLUE part of the pixel between 0 and 255.

function.name: sync_time
function.description: Synchronize the local time to the device. You can optionally pass a date-time string in the format 'dd-mm-YYYY-HH:MM:SS'. If no time is provided, the current time will be used.

datetime_str.description: The date and time string in the format 'dd-mm-YYYY-HH:MM:SS'.

function.name: flip_screen
function.description: Flip the device screen 180 degrees. By default, the screen is flipped if no parameter is provided.

flip.description: Specify whether to flip the screen. Use 'TRUE' to flip or 'FALSE' to keep the current orientation. Defaults to 'TRUE'.

function.name: toggle_screen_freeze
function.description: Toggle the screen freeze state. This function alternates between freezing and unfreezing the screen.

function.name: screen
function.description: Turn the screen on or off based on the provided toggle value.

toggle.description: Specify 'ON' to turn the screen on or 'OFF' to turn it off.

function.name: set_brightness
function.description: Set the brightness of the screen. The brightness value should be between 5 and 100.

intensity.description: The brightness level to set, ranging from 5 to 100.

function.name: chronograph
function.description: Set the chronograph mode. Acceptable modes range from 0 to 3.

chronograph_mode.description: The chronograph mode to set, specified as a string. Valid values are '0', '1', '2', or '3'.

function.name: clock
function.description: Set the clock mode with various customizable options including clock mode, color, date display, and 24-hour format.

clock_mode.description: The clock mode to set. Valid values range from '0' to '7'. 0 = default. 1 = christmas. 2 = racing. 3 = inverted full screen. 4 = animated hourglass

clock_color.description: The color of the clock in 'R-G-B' format where R, G, and B are integers between 0 and 255.

clock_with_date.description: Specify 'TRUE' to include the date with the clock, or 'FALSE' to omit it. This is optional.

clock_24h.description: Specify 'TRUE' to use a 24-hour format, or 'FALSE' to use a 12-hour format. This is optional.

function.name: countdown
function.description: Set the countdown mode with the specified time in minutes and seconds. Valid modes range from 0 to 3.

countdown_mode.description: The countdown mode to set. Valid values range from '0' to '3'. 0 = disable. 1 = start. 2 = pause. 3 = restart

countdown_timer_minutes.description: The number of minutes for the countdown. Valid values range from '0' to '99'.

countdown_timer_seconds.description: The number of seconds for the countdown. Valid values range from '0' to '59'.

function.name: pixelColor
function.description: Set the colors of specific pixels based on the given list of arguments. Each pixel requires five values: x, y, r, g, and b.

pixel_argument.description: A list of pixel settings. Each setting is a string in the format 'x-y-r-g-b', where x and y specify the pixel coordinates, and r, g, b specify the color values (0-255).

function.name: setText
function.description: Set the text to be displayed on the device with customizable options including font size, color, background color, speed, and mode.

text_str.description: The text to be displayed. This is optional and can be left empty.

text_size.description: The font size for the text. The default size is 16.

text_mode.description: The mode for text display. This is a numeric value where 0 is the default.

text_speed.description: The speed at which the text moves. The default value is 95.

text_color.description: The color of the text in 'R-G-B' format where R, G, and B are integers between 0 and 255. The default is '255-0-0' (red).

text_bg_color.description: The background color of the text in 'R-G-B' format where R, G, and B are integers between 0 and 255. The default is '255-255-255' (white).

text_color_mode.description: The color mode for the text. This is a numeric value where 1 is the default.

text_bg_mode.description: The background mode for the text. This is a numeric value where 0 is the default.

function.name: scoreboard
function.description: Set the scoreboard with two scores and display them. Each score must be between 0 and 999.

argument.description: The scores to set on the scoreboard, formatted as 'score1-score2'. Both scores must be non-negative integers between 0 and 999.
